summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Riviera Place Northeast from the production west of the south line of Lot 19, Block 4, Riviera Beach Addition Division No. 3, to the production east of East 125th Street; and certain other streets and avenues; by paving and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 18051 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds."
